ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend Research Methods to another student. Research Methods is an adaptive course in that the readings seem to be carefully selected to expose its students to material they are most likely to be unaware of. For example, my classmates and I were psychologists by training and therefore the course material addressed sociological research methods. Due to this adaptive structure, by taking this class you're not only receiving a guided tour through new terrain, but your receiving it in a highly personalized way, which makes this course equally unique and valuable.
Yes I would definitely recommend this course to a fellow student.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Touched on a variety of areas to ensure we have breadth of knowledge - giving us the information we need to determine if we need/want to go deeper into specific topic areas.
This course expanded my understanding of research methods in related disciplines so that I can understand the techniques used in related fields and make my work more transitional.
